    • Uses of ProtocolSecLevel in edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.coinTossing

      Classes in edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.coinTossing that implement ProtocolSecLevel 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CTBlumPartyOne
      This class plays as party one of coin tossing Blum protocol, which tosses a single bit.
      class  CTBlumPartyTwo
      This class plays as party two of coin tossing Blum protocol, which tosses a single bit.
      class  CTSemiSimulatablePartyOne
      This class plays as party one of coin tossing protocol which tosses a string.
      class  CTSemiSimulatablePartyTwo
      This class plays as party two of coin tossing protocol which tosses a string.
      class  CTStringPartyOne
      Concrete implementation of a protocol for tossing a string from party one's point of view.
      class  CTStringPartyTwo
      Concrete implementation of a protocol for tossing a string from party two's point of view.

    • Uses of ProtocolSecLevel in edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.ot.fullSimulation

      Classes in edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.ot.fullSimulation that implement ProtocolSecLevel 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  OTFullSimDDHOnByteArrayReceiver
      Concrete implementation of the receiver side in oblivious transfer based on the DDH assumption that achieves full simulation.
      class  OTFullSimDDHOnByteArraySender
      Concrete implementation of the sender side in oblivious transfer based on the DDH assumption that achieves full simulation.
      class  OTFullSimDDHOnGroupElementReceiver
      Concrete implementation of the receiver side in oblivious transfer based on the DDH assumption that achieves full simulation.
      class  OTFullSimDDHOnGroupElementSender
      Concrete implementation of the sender side in oblivious transfer based on the DDH assumption that achieves full simulation.

    • Uses of ProtocolSecLevel in edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.ot.fullSimulationROM

      Classes in edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.ot.fullSimulationROM that implement ProtocolSecLevel 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  OTFullSimROMDDHOnByteArrayReceiver
      Concrete implementation of the receiver side in oblivious transfer based on the DDH assumption that achieves full simulation in the random oracle model.
      class  OTFullSimROMDDHOnByteArraySender
      Concrete implementation of the sender side in oblivious transfer based on the DDH assumption that achieves full simulation in the random oracle model.
      class  OTFullSimROMDDHOnGroupElementReceiver
      Concrete implementation of the receiver side in oblivious transfer based on the DDH assumption that achieves full simulation in the random oracle model.
      class  OTFullSimROMDDHOnGroupElementSender
      Concrete implementation of the sender side in oblivious transfer based on the DDH assumption that achieves full simulation in the random oracle model.

    • Uses of ProtocolSecLevel in edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.ot.oneSidedSimulation

      Classes in edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.ot.oneSidedSimulation that implement ProtocolSecLevel 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  OTOneSidedSimDDHOnByteArrayReceiver
      Concrete implementation of the receiver side in oblivious transfer based on the DDH assumption that achieves privacy for the case that the sender is corrupted and simulation in the case that the receiver is corrupted.
      class  OTOneSidedSimDDHOnByteArraySender
      Concrete implementation of the sender side in oblivious transfer based on the DDH assumption that achieves privacy for the case that the sender is corrupted and simulation in the case that the receiver is corrupted.
      class  OTOneSidedSimDDHOnGroupElementReceiver
      Concrete implementation of the receiver side in oblivious transfer based on the DDH assumption that achieves privacy for the case that the sender is corrupted and simulation in the case that the receiver is corrupted.
      class  OTOneSidedSimDDHOnGroupElementSender
      Concrete implementation of the sender side in oblivious transfer based on the DDH assumption that achieves privacy for the case that the sender is corrupted and simulation in the case that the receiver is corrupted.

    • Uses of ProtocolSecLevel in edu.biu.scapi.securityLevel

      Subinterfaces of ProtocolSecLevel in edu.biu.scapi.securityLevel 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Covert
      Any protocol that is secure in the presence of covert adversaries should implement this interface.
      interface  Malicious
      Any protocol that is secure in the presence of malicious adversaries should implement this interface.
      interface  OneSidedSimulation 
      interface  PrivacyOnly 
      interface  SemiHonest
      Any protocol that is secure in the presence of semi-honest adversaries should implement this interface.
      interface  StandAlone
      Any protocol that is proven secure in the stand-alone model (where secure protocols are run sequentially and not concurrently) should implement this interface.
      interface  UC
      Any protocol that is universally composable (aka.
